text: Kid Krow is the debut album of singer songwriter, Conan Gray. It came out on March 19th, 2020. Its most popular songs are Heather and Maniac, with a new one rising up to fame, The Cut That Always Bleeds (shortened to TCTAB). The songs in this album are: Comfort Crowd Wish You Were Sober Maniac (Online Love) Checkmate Fight Or Flight Afluenza (Can We Be Friends?) Heather Little Legue The Story Most of the songs in Kid Krow were singles, such as Comfort Crowd and The Story.
title: Kid Krow
